description: Borrowed from French lingerie (“linen closet”). The irregular pronunciation is caused by ongoing merge of French vowel /ɛ̃/ into /ɑ̃/, the former of which are contained in the French word.

entries.meaning: Underwear or nightclothes, especially when lacy or designed to be seductive.

examples: Empire matinees in lingerie stuffs with trimmings of lace and embroidery are shown in great variety.
